div.head: 蛇盤瘰癧
div.div: snake coil scrofula with pervasion illness

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: snake coil scrofula with pervasion illness

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with she pan li 蛇盤癧 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hai zao 海藻 quoting Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 19: 蛇盤癧， ”Snake-coil pervasion-illness”, writes: 蛇盤瘰癧 , “ Snake coil scrofula with pervasion - illness ”.
